Package it.unibo.ds.core.codes

Interface CodeManager<C>

Type Parameters:
C - the type of the context.
All Known Implementing Classes:
CodeManagerImpl
public interface CodeManager<C>
An interface modeling a OneTimeCode manager, which exposes functions to generate, (in)validate and verify one-time-codes.

  • Method Details

    • generateFor

      OneTimeCode generateFor(C context, String electionId, String userId) throws AlreadyGeneratedCodeException
      Generates a new OneTimeCode for the given election.
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the transaction
      electionId - the election identifier
      userId - the user identifier
      Returns:
      a new OneTimeCode instance for the given user and election.
      Throws:
      AlreadyGeneratedCodeException - if a code for the given election and user has already been generated.

    • generateFor

      default OneTimeCode generateFor(String electionId, String userId) throws AlreadyGeneratedCodeException
      Generates a new OneTimeCode.
      Parameters:
      electionId - the election identifier
      userId - the user identifier
      Returns:
      a new OneTimeCode instance for the given user and election.
      Throws:
      AlreadyGeneratedCodeException - if a code for the given election and user has already been generated.

    • isValid

      boolean isValid(C context, String electionId, String userId, OneTimeCode code)
      Check if the given code is still valid, i.e. has not been consumed yet for the given election.
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the transaction
      electionId - the election identifier
      userId - the user identifier
      code - the code to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the given code is still valid, false otherwise.

    • isValid

      default boolean isValid(String electionId, String userId, OneTimeCode code)
      Check if the given code is still valid, i.e. has not been consumed yet for the given election.
      Parameters:
      electionId - the election identifier
      userId - the user identifier
      code - the code to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the given code is still valid, false otherwise.

    • invalidate

      void invalidate(C context, String electionId, String userId, OneTimeCode code) throws NotValidCodeException, AlreadyConsumedCodeException
      Invalidate the given code for the given election. After calling this method the code can no longer be used.
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the transaction
      electionId - the election identifier
      userId - the user identifier
      code - the code to be validated
      Throws:
      NotValidCodeException - if the given code is not valid.
      AlreadyConsumedCodeException - if the given code has already been consumed.

    • invalidate

      default void invalidate(String electionId, String userId, OneTimeCode code) throws NotValidCodeException, AlreadyConsumedCodeException
      Invalidate the given code for the given election. After calling this method the code can no longer be used.
      Parameters:
      electionId - the election identifier
      userId - the user identifier
      code - the code to be validated
      Throws:
      NotValidCodeException - if the given code is not valid.
      AlreadyConsumedCodeException - if the given code has already been consumed.

    • verifyCodeOwner

      boolean verifyCodeOwner(C context, String electionId, String userId, OneTimeCode code)
      Verifies if the given code has been generated for the given user and election.
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the transaction
      electionId - the election identifier
      userId - the user identifier
      code - the code to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the given code is correct, false otherwise.

    • verifyCodeOwner

      default boolean verifyCodeOwner(String electionId, String userId, OneTimeCode code)
      Verifies if the given code has been generated for the given user and election.
      Parameters:
      electionId - the election identifier
      userId - the user identifier
      code - the code to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the given code is correct, false otherwise.
